archimate:Requirement.name: SA.1.5.1: All users should be authenticated by using an identifier (e.g. a User ID) and an authenticator (e.g. a password, (sometimes referred to as a passphrase, passcode or PIN code)) before they can gain access to critical or sensitive information, business applications, operating systems, endpoint devices or networks.
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
